document.heading: Prevention of Premature Release of Mentally Incompetent Defendants Temporary Amendment Act of 2003

history.narrative: Law 14-311, the “Prevention of Premature Release of Mentally Incompetent Defendants Temporary Amendment Act of 2003”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-1008, and was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 17, 2002, and January 7, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 22, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 14-626 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-311 became effective on June 12, 2003.
